mutants.code:
def max_sum_substring(w: str, x: list, b: list, n: int) -> str:
    max_so_far = +float('inf')
    max_current = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    s = 0
    if n == 0:
        return w
    for cur in range(len(w)):
        new_asc = ord(w[cur])
        if w[cur] in x:
            new_asc = b[x.index(w[cur])]
        max_current += new_asc
        if max_so_far < max_current:
            max_so_far = max_current
            i = s
            j = cur
        if max_current < 0:
            max_current = 0
            s = cur + 1
    return w[i:j + 1]

            max_current = 0
            s = cur + 2
    return w[i:j + 1]

def max_sum_substring(w: str, x: list, b: list, n: int) -> str:
    max_so_far = -float('inf')
    max_current = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    s = 0
    if n == 0:
        return w
    for cur in range(len(w)):
        new_asc = ord(w[cur])
        if w[cur] in x:
            new_asc = b[x.index(w[cur])]
        max_current += new_asc
        if max_so_far < max_current:
            max_so_far = max_current
            i = s
            j = cur
        if max_current < 0:
            max_current = 0
            s = cur + 0
    return w[i:j + 1]

    max_so_far = -float('inf')
    max_current = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    s = 0
    if n == 0:
        return w
    for cur in range(len(w)):
        new_asc = ord(w[cur])
        if w[cur] in x:
            new_asc = b[x.index(w[cur])]

        if max_so_far < max_current:
